table.name: shipment_special_service
table.description: Allows you to define remarks for why a special service applies to the associated shipment.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The shipment associated with the remark.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_SPECIAL_SERVICE_SEQ
columns.description: The sequence to keep shipment special services unique.

columns.name: SPECIAL_SERVICE_GID
columns.description: The special service associated with the remark.

columns.name: STOP_NUM
columns.description: If the special service is for a particular stop, this indicates the stop number.

columns.name: PROCESS_AS_FLOW_THRU
columns.description: The override for record to be copied to the sell side during rating.

columns.name: ADJUSTMENT_REASON_GID
columns.description: The reason why charge was added.

columns.name: COMPLETION_STATE
columns.description: Indicates completion state of this special service.

columns.name: PAYABLE_INDICATOR_GID
columns.description: Indicates the payable status of this special service; if values, overrides the payable status on the special service itself.

columns.name: BILLABLE_INDICATOR_GID
columns.description: indicates the billable status of this special service; if values, overrides the billable status on the special service itself.

columns.name: ACTUAL_OCCUR_TIME
columns.description: The actual date and time special service occurred.

columns.name: PLANNED_DURATION
columns.description: The planned duration of the special service.

columns.name: PLANNED_DURATION_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The planned duration unit of measure.

columns.name: PLANNED_DURATION_BASE
columns.description: The planned duration in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: IS_PLANNED_DURATION_FIXED
columns.description: If Y, prevents the system from overwriting the planned duration for the special service.

columns.name: ACTUAL_DURATION
columns.description: The actual duration of the special service.

columns.name: ACTUAL_DURATION_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The actual duration unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_DURATION_BASE
columns.description: The actual duration in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_DISTANCE
columns.description: The actual distance of the special service.

columns.name: ACTUAL_DISTANCE_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The actual distance unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_DISTANCE_BASE
columns.description: The actual distance in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_WEIGHT
columns.description: The actual weight of the goods applicable to this special service.

columns.name: ACTUAL_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The actual weight unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The actual weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_VOLUME
columns.description: The actual volume of the goods applicable to this special service.

columns.name: ACTUAL_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The actual volume unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The actual volume base unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_SHIP_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: The actual ship unit count applicable to this special service.

columns.name: ACTUAL_ITEM_PACKAGE_COUNT
columns.description: The actual package count applicable to this special service.

columns.name: IS_SYSTEM_GENERATED
columns.description: Indicates if this special service was created by the system. It allows logic to determine which special services to leave in place when re-syncing the shipment special services.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
